  "url_item" : "http://doi.org/10.25549/berndt-m584",
  "description" : [ "Photograph of Children playing with hamsters, Saint Vincent Center, Los Angeles, 1996. Three children gather on one side of a table, watching two dwarf hamsters. One hamster is on the table, walking across a piece of paper. The other hamster is on an adult's hands. The three children are focused on the hamster on the table, with one girl reaching for the hamster with her left hand." ],

creator: Berndt, Jerry
description: Photograph of Children playing with hamsters, Saint Vincent Center, Los Angeles, 1996. Three children gather on one side of a table, watching two dwarf hamsters. One hamster is on the table, walking across a piece of paper. The other hamster is on an adult's hands. The three children are focused on the hamster on the table, with one girl reaching for the hamster with her left hand.
